name: Golf Royal Solitaire
description:
The game is played with a single pack of 52 playing cards. One Joker is added to the deck and used as wild card that represent any value.

Try to win as many rounds of Golf Royal as you can by removing all the cards.  Cards can be removed from the layout if they are one higher or lower than the visible deck card shown at the bottom.

The Ace is both high and low, and either a 2 or a King can be player on it.

  The Wild Card (Joker) can be player at any point you desire and of course absolutely any card can be placed on top of them.

  For massive scores you can sometimes chain card runs together using the Joker.
